title: Life At Camp Moses
description: Witness the faithfulness of God through the history and impact of Camp Moses

events.title: Children's Ministry
events.description: Continuing our mission to reach young lives, we expanded our children's ministry with engaging programs that help kids discover God's love in nature.

events.title: Camp Moses Children's Camp
events.description: Our children's camp provided a safe, joyful environment where over 80 children experienced God's presence through worship, games, and spiritual lessons.

events.title: First Official Youth Retreat
events.description: Over 60 young people attended our first official youth retreat, experiencing transformation through worship, community, and Christ-centered teaching in God's creation.

events.title: Kids Summer Camp - Experiencing God
events.description: Our inaugural kids summer camp brought joy and spiritual growth to 70+ children. Explore photos and videos from this amazing season of ministry.

events.title: The Bamboo Project
events.description: A community-building initiative where volunteers worked together to plant bamboo seedlings from Mindanao, strengthening both our facilities and our fellowship.

events.title: We Built a Well for Our Water Supply
events.description: Community members and staff united in this transformative project to build a fresh water well, providing clean water and demonstrating God's provision for Camp Moses and the surrounding community.
